1423321.content:
Team RWBY woke up early in the morning, ready for another day of class. Weiss was the first to wake up, rubbing her eyes and stepping out of bed. She noticed that Yang's bed was empty, but presumed that the blonde had got up to be first in the shower.

However, when Weiss stepped into the bathroom and Yang was nowhere to be seen, she was baffled. It wasn't like the party girl to get up early. But still being sleepy, Weiss just shrugged it off, hopping into the shower.

Ruby was up next, groggily coming to her senses, as she rolled over and fell out of bed. She promptly stood up, and raised her hands in a fighting stance, fully awake now, as if her rolling out of bed had been an attack. This prompted Blake to slowly open one eye, spy Ruby in the middle of the room, and close her eye, falling back asleep.

"GOOD MORNING TEAM RUBY!" The younger girl bellowed, causing Weiss to drop the shampoo in the next room, and Blake scampered up to the top bunk in fear.

"RUBY! Would you please shut up?" Weiss demanded, poking her head around the bathroom door wearing only a towel.

"Sorry..." Ruby blushed, grinning goofily at her partner, who rolled her eyes.

"Wait a minute... Where's yang?" Blake asked the other two from yangs bunk.

"I thought she'd got up early to study. Smart idea if you ask me." Weiss replied.

"And you thought that was possible why?" Blake retorted.

"Guys, I'm worried!" Ruby exclaimed. "What if something happened? She could be in trouble and need our help!" Before either of the girls could try to comfort Ruby, there was a knock at the door.

"Hey kid, open up. It's me. We gotta talk. It's about Yang." Qrows voice came from behind the door. Without thinking, Ruby swung the door open and pulled Qrow into the dorm, causing Weiss to shriek and slam the bathroom door behind her.

"Uncle Qrow! Yangs missing and we think she's in trouble and needs our help and we have to -" Ruby was pacified by Blakes hand over her mouth, before the cat faunas let go of the team leader once she'd calmed down.

"Do you know where she is?" Blake asked calmly, but a hint of worry remained in her voice. Qrow sighed.

"Follow me."

The three girls got dressed (while Qrow waited outside) before they followed the old man to Ozpins office. Once there, the three girls were greeted by Ozpin, Glynda, Dr Oobleck, General Ironwoods, and even Taiyang Xiao Long, Ruby and yangs father.

"Dad? What's going on?" Ruby asked. The group all looked uncomfortable, except for ozpin, who was remarkably calm.

"Where's yang?" Demanded Blake, somewhat more aggressive than she had intended.

"Right here." Replied a female voice. The girls turned to see the woman that they all recognised as yangs mother, Raven Branwen. However, they gasped in shock when they saw that she was...
1423321.title: Raven

choices: They try to find some answers
14233211.content:
"But you're... why are you here?" Ruby stammered. She looked over at her father and uncle Qrow for answers, who were seemingly just as uncomfortable as she was. Ruby looked back at Raven, who had her hand resting on her bulging belly.

She recognised the woman from her dad's 'team STRQ' photo, but she was dressed differently. She was still a very attractive woman, with crimson eyes, Jet black hair and pale skin. However, instead of her Armoured combat outfit, she wore dark baggy trousers, and a dark red shirt that didn't cover her whole belly. She also had a black jacket draped over her shoulders, which couldn't be fastened over her belly. Her sword was leaning against Ozpins desk, near where Qrow was leaning.

"Hello Ruby. I take it you recognise me?" Raven asked, earning no reply but confused looks from the team and a cold stare from Ruby.

"Hang on a minute." Weiss interrupted. "You're yangs mother, right? You've been gone all these years, and suddenly show up when yang goes missing?" Raven chuckled as the girls glared at her, as if unsure how they should feel about her being here.

"Where is she?" Blake demanded again, clenching her fists.

"I already told you. Right here." Raven replied, patting her belly gently. The girls stared in confusion, before ozpin spoke up.

"It would appear that Yang has accidentally used some sort of dark magic that grants the user one wish. However, the effects can be unpredictable. While I'm certain that this magic was used, I have no idea what she could have wished for that would result in this scenario." Ozpin explained.

"But yang only went missing yesterday! How is Raven already so pregnant?" Weiss asked.

"Like he said, we don't know how this happened." Glynda replied. "Raven showed up a few hours ago and explained the situation, and we knew dark magic was at work after Professor Oobleck ran some tests."

"Doctor." The green haired man corrected her, sipping his coffee.

"But I still don't understand!" Ruby said, her head hurting from trying to take all this in. "How do we get yang back to normal?"

"We don't know." Qrow answered, before being interrupted by Taiyang.

"But we're doing everything we can sweetheart." He told his daughter, hugging her.

"We'll know more on her condition once Raven has... given birth to her." Ironwood explained.

"So yangs... in her womb." Ruby asked, earning a few nods. "And when she gives birth... wait, do you mean to say that Yang's going to be born again as a baby?" Ruby asked as realisation hit her.

"We think so. Why?" Taiyang asked. Ruby bit her lip.

"She... mentioned something about being my younger sister." She told them. "She said that she wished that she was younger than me." Ruby explained.

"That must be what caused this." Glynda said. "She wanted to be younger than Ruby, so the curse sent her back to ravens womb."



What happens next?

142332112.content:
Ruby went to ask more questions, the girls were still very confused about the whole situation. However, before she got the chance, Raven began groaning.

"Ahhhh!" She groaned, holding her belly as she hunched over, her face screwed up in discomfort.

"What is it? Is yang ok?" Ruby asked worriedly. Raven simply closed her eyes, as Taiyang, Glynda and Oobleck gathered around her. All of a sudden, fluid began to seep out of ravens trousers, and formed a pool on the floor.

"She's coming." Raven managed to get out, as her face turned red and she moaned.

"She's going into labour!" Oobleck called out, as they helped her to the elevator. "We must take her to the hospital immediately!" He stated in his usual enthusiastic tone.

"Wait for me!" Ruby caller, following them, as the relevant or doors closed. "She's my sister, I have to be there for her." She stated, as she and Qrow joined them in the elevator.




Weiss and Blake, still somewhat in shock, we're standing still in Ozpins office, along with Ozpin and Ironwood.

"Did your friends mother just go into labour... with our team mate?" Weiss hesitantly asked aloud.

"...yep." Blake replied, her face had the same blank look as Weiss's.




Meanwhile, at the hospital, Taiyang held his former lovers hand while she gave birth to their daughter... again, while Ruby and Qrow watched uncomfortably. Glynda had left to update ozpin, while Oobleck had rather been forced out of the room since he wasn't family, and had been harassing the doctors and midwives.

It took several hours of Raven screaming in agony, almost crushing the bones in Taiyangs hand to dust, while Qrow and Ruby had left for dome thing to eat to calm their nerves.

Finally, they were called into the room. There was no screaming coming from the door, and they entered to see Raven holding a small bundle of cloth. Approaching it, they saw a baby girl with violet eyes and wispy yellow hair. Yang.

Careful not to wake her teammates, yang crawled up onto her bunk bed, and pulled the covers back, only to find a small glass bottle with a note. The bottle contained a strange purple/pink liquid, which yang thought looked strange. She opened the note, and silently read:

"Dear yang, please drink this potion that I made especially for you. I think you'll be pleased with the effects of it. Sincerely, unknown"

Yang frowned. Whatever it was, it certainly looked strange, yet somewhat intriguing. Eventually deciding to chance it, yang chugged the whole bottle, before putting it and the note aside and going to sleep.

The next day, yang wakes up, feeling surprisingly refreshed. She stretches, before looking over at her team, who seemed to be whispering and glancing at her.

"Whoever wrote that note obviously did this." Blake whispered.

"Of course! But she was foolish to drink that in the first place. Who knows what it could do!?" Weiss whisper/shouted.

"I'd say that's pretty obvious Weiss." Ruby replied, visibly worried. Ruby then looked over at yang, seeing her watching them. "She's awake! What do we do?"

Blake shifted uncomfortably, before sighing. She walked over to yang, placed her hands under her armpits, and lifted yang out of bed.

"That's weird, since when has Blake been taller than me?" Yang thought to herself. Looking at her partner, yang saw that Blake was a lot bigger than her. As though she'd grown several feet overnight.

"Yang..." Yang looked at ruby, who seemed to have also grown. What was going on?

"Yang... sis... It's going to be ok, you've just... changed..." Yang frowned, confused, until Blake held her in front of the mirror. Yang gasped, and almost fainted when she saw Blake holding...

"W...wot happens too me bwake?" Yang asked, realising that she shunned like a two year old.

Blake looked at her, in what can only be described as pity. "Yang, I'm so sorry. It must have been that potion you drank." Yang remembered the potion from last night. She looked around the room, and saw wuss holding the note that came with the regression potion.

"Bwake putt me dowwn." Yang demanded. Blake did as her partner asked, carefully putting the two year old on the floor. Yang only came up to just above Blake's knee now. Her hair was shorter, and her clothes no longer fit. Yang tried to walk forward, but tripped over her enormous shirt, falling over and banging her knee on the floor. Of course, as a child, yang felt pain greater, and even just banging her knee caused her to yell, and her eyes began watering.

"Yang, it's ok. Come here." Ruby cooed, trying to comfort her 'big' sister.

"Wuby, sdop it! Am not a bwaby!" Yang almost shouted. Ruby backed off. Yang did her best to look angry, but as a two year old, simply looked scared and confused, both of which she was.

"We're going to need to buy her some baby clothes." Weiss commented, as yang pulled her shirt around her to cover her naked toddlers body.

"I agree, but we need to figure out how to reverse this first. Maybe we should ask Ozpin, or glynda." Blake added.

Yang looked up at her teammates. Whether it was from the potion, the stress, the shock, being in a toddlers body, or just being overwhelmed by everything, yang suddenly burst into tears. The team stopped looked at her, panicking. Ruby then stepped forward, picking her up and cradling her against her shoulder.

"Sshh. It's ok.It's ok. We're going to fix this. Please stop crying, we can't let anyone find out." Ruby whispered to yang, holding her. Yang hated the idea of her little sister babying her, but her life would be over if anyone found out that she got turned into a toddler. Sniffling, yang stopped crying, still silently sobbing and shuddering.

"It's ok yang. I promise you, we'll find a way to fix this."

The last thing Cinder could remember, she was at the top of beacon tower, fighting Pyrrha Nikos. She had just killed the girl, when Ruby Rose appeared at the side of her and unleashed the power of her silver eyes.

Then everything went white.

Cinder lost all of her memories. She couldn't remember people she knew, or what her plan was. She couldn't even remember how to walk or talk. 15522.content:
Cinder was worn out and weary from her fight, but she didn't let it show. She glanced over at Mercury, who looked just as tired as she felt. She looked for Emerald, and saw her lay in the dirt beneath the fall maiden. Amber raised her staff, ready to strike, when Cinder fired an arrow right at her. The girl fell to the ground, as Emerald and Mercury grabbed her and held her down in front of Cinder.

The woman reached out, ready to extract the fall maidens power, but instead of what she was expecting, there was a flash of light. Mercury and Emerald shielded their eyes, looking away, and when they looked back, Cinder had vanished.

Amber, taking her chance, fled the scene, and the two didn't bother going after her without Cinder. Amber was injured, and thought she would die any minute. She collapsed on the side of the road, just as a tall dark haired figure approached her. The last thing she remembered was the man with the scythe - then she fell unconscious.

155222.content:
Amber's body was sore all over, as she slowly began to regain her consciousness. The young girl groaned, as she came to, and she opened her eyes groggily. She was in unfamiliar surroundings. What she was looking at was the ceiling, which, along with the walls, was white. She recalled her fight, and deduced that she must be in hospital.

"Hey, take it easy kid." Amber jumped at the voice. She turned to its source, and spotted the tall dark haired man sitting mere feet away from her bed. She scrambled to sit up, grunting as the pain in her chest and ribs resided. The man seemed to comfort her, which didn't make her less suspicious of him.

"What... who are you?" She questioned. Despite her young age, Amber had learned to adapt to her powers and become more weary of strangers, though some would call her paranoid. As though sensing her tension, the man backed off a bit, leading Amber to believe he could be a friend, but she didn't drop her guard.

"Names Qrow. Qrow Branwen. It's OK, I'm a huntsman, and I know about your powers... Fall maiden. Don't worry, I'm here to protect you, not try to steal your powers like that woman." Amber's eyes widened.

"But that's impossible!" The maiden blurted out. The man who was Qrow leaned back, sighing.

"Apparently so, since it didn't work." He stated calmly. "She just vanished, and her goons ran away." He informed Amber, refreshing her memory. Her paranoia kicked in again.

"How do you know? We're you following me?" She demanded to know. Qrow simply chuckled to himself.

"Well, yeah... but not like that. When we got word that someone was targeting the maidens, Ozpin sent me to look out for you. Good job too." Qrow took a swig from a flask in his jacket.

"Ozpin... so this is beacon? I'm in Vale?" Amber asked, earning a nod from Qrow. He then proceeded to stand up and look out of the window beside Amber's bed. She saw a Raven pirched on a branch on a great tree outside her window.

"Rest up now Autumn. Doctors reckon you'll be up and about in no time, but they don't know about your powers. Since they enhance your Aura, I'd say you'll be back to normal in a day or two, and you'll both be fine." Qrows eyes widened as he realised what he'd just let slip. Amber glared at him, knowing he'd kept something from her

"...both?" Was all she asked. Qrow turned to her, smiling awkwardly.

"You know... you and the baby..." He pointed at her belly. Without hesitation, Amber bolted up ignoring her pain.

"What did you do while I was out?" She demanded, a serious look on her face. Qrow gave her a confused look, before an expression of realisation dawned on him.

"You think I - NO! Nonononono! That wasn't what..." Qrow stumbled over his words, before composing himself. "Look, I was protecting you. I didn't touch you, I swear. Besides, you're way too young for me. What are you, 17? 18?"

"Then what happened, because I don't see how I could be pregnant considering I've never..." Amber stopped herself, blushing, which made Qrow smirk knowingly. He then sighed, sitting back down.

"Ozpin thinks it's something to do with the woman who tried to steal your powers. Apparently she got you pregnant. Don't ask how, because we don't know. Just rest, I'll stay right here if you need me." He paused, looking at her. For the first time, sober saw what seemed to be kindness in his eyes.

"I'm kind of tired." Amber said, yawning. Qrow nodded, sitting back, as Amber dozed off to sleep.

1552222.content:
Note* (Cinder is a fully formed baby, but Amber's belly still grows the same as normal pregnancy. She will be in the womb for nine months, as per usual)



Darkness. It surrounded Cinder. She couldn't see a thing. She could hear voices and noises faintly. She could feel, smell, taste. But there was no light. She couldn't move much, though she didn't seem to be restrained at all. The last thing she remembered was trying to steal the fall maidens power, before a flash of light knocked he out and she woke up here a few hours ago.

Prehaps she'd been arrested, and this was some sort of weird prison. Or prehaps she was in a coma. Or maybe she was dead, and this was hell. No, it was too cosy to be hell. It could be purgatory. Or limbo.

Cinder tried to move, but her hand hit a soft flesh like wall. Her whole body was wet, and she was submerged in some strange liquid, but she didn't seem to be drowning. She also noticed that she seemed to be naked, and her body had changed too.

She didn't seem to have any teeth, and all her hair was gone save for a few patches, leading to velieve she had been imprisoned and tortured, having her head shaved and teeth pulled out. The thought both angered and terrified her. However, her arms seemed shorter, and we're a lot more stubby, like her legs, but they definitely hadn't been amputated or lost. She could feel her fingers and toes, although they were fat like sausages. What's more, her once generous chest was now flat, her breaths nonexistent. She touched her face, which felt big and fat, with no particularly defining features.

Strangest of all prehaps, was a long fleshy cord attatched to her belly. She couldn't feel her bellybutton, and deduced that it was inserted into there. She was unable to pull it out, and her instincts told her that it may be the only thing keeping her alive, so she gave up trying.

Defeated, Cinder rested, floating in the liquid that filled her prison. As far as she could tell, there was no way out of here. She was surprisingly comfy, at least since there wasn't much room here. There was only enough space for her to be curled up in a ball, her arms and legs tucked in, and the soft walls tight around her body.

It suddenly occurred to her that she needed to go to the bathroom. She opened her mouth to shout to her captors that she needed the toilet, but nothing came out. It wasn't that she couldn't speak, it was as if she had forgotten how to speak. She deduced that she wouldn't need the bathroom if she was dead, so at least that was a plus.

Seemingly unable to hold it in, Cinder began to urinate into the fluid surrounding her. She felt unbelievably shameful, thinking that someone was purposefully trying to humiliate her.

Feeling tired, Cinder closed her eyes - despite being in pitch darkness - and slowly dozed off to sleep.
1552222.title: Switch to Cinders POV (In Amber's womb)

Cinder wakes up in the womb again
15522222.content:
Amber woke up in the hospital bed. She looked around for the man who'd told her his name was Qrow, but he wasn't there. For a second, she was almost sad that he had left, until the curtain was pulled back to reveal him standing there with a woman wearing a white coat. A doctor she presumed.

She introduced herself as Doctor Gale, before asking Amber a series of questions like "how do you feel?" "Do you remember what happend?" And "Are you in any pain". All the while she was jotting down her answers, while Qrow was stood by the wall, watching over the maiden. The doctor finished her questions, thanking Amber. She turned to Qrow.

"Are you the father of the baby?" She asked him. He snapped out of his trance in shock.

"Wha- hell no! I'm old enough to be her dad got crying out loud!" He chuckled, shaking his head. The doctor seemed concerned, and amber wasn't amused either.

"Do you know who the father is?" Doctor Gale asked Amber. She looked at her, mouth hanging open.

"...no...no, you see, I don't know how this happened. It's just that I've never..." She paused, glancing at Qrow uncomfortably. He was looking away, pretending not to be paying attention. She guessed he was trying to make her less uncomfortable, which she thought was nice of him.

"...I've never has sex. I'm only nineteen. Maybe the ultrasound was wrong. Is there any other tests you can do?" She asked. The doctor gave her an odd look, as she realised how stupid it sounded, to say she was a 'pregnant virgin'. Amber's face glowed a shade of red, before the doctor answered.

"We can arrange to have a DNA test. But if that's all, you seem to have healed at an alarming rate, and should be good to go whenever you'd like to leave. Although you'd better still rest up for a few weeks until your better. And make sure you stay healthy for that baby." She stated, smiling at the girl. Amber thanked her, and she left.

Amber looked down at her belly. It was flat, but wouldn't stay that way for long. Soon she wouldn't be able to fight, or do much for herself. She'd need some here to stay. Especially with people after her power.

She placed her hands on to of each other on her belly, rubbing it gently, as it dawned on her that there was a human growing inside her without a father. Just then, Qrow put his hand on her shoulder.

"Her, Imma look after you kiddo. You're safe while I'm around." He smiled. She guessed he was being sincere, but it was hard to take him seriously when he was drinking from that flask.

"Thank you." She spoke, almost under her breath. She looked up into Qrows red eyes.

"Qrow... I'm scared." She said. She wasn't going to cry, but she was biting her bottom lip and squeezing Qrows hand with her right one, while her left rested on her belly. Qrow touched her head, staring back into her big brown eyes. Truth be told this was the first time he thought about how attractive she was. Short hair looked cute on her, and her flawless dark skin was softer than anything he'd felt. He hadn't paid much attention to her body, but her face was strong, yet full of innocence and the stubbornness of youth. He kissed her forehead, earning him one of her adorable blushes.

"I know. But you don't have to be. As long as I'm here, no harm will come to you."

Amber was released from the hospital that day. Qrow told her that he had a friend on the island of patch that she could stay with. Another huntsman named 'Taiyang Xiao Long'. He supposedly trusted this man, and oddly enough, Amber found herself trusting Qrow.

When they left the hospital, Qrow told her that they'd be meeting with Ozpin to discuss the incident tomorrow. Ozpin had given her time to rest up before then, which she was grateful for. Amber and Qrow headed to Taiyangs home on patch on an airship.

They arrived about midday, giving them half a day of rest and another half day of sleep before meeting Ozpin. Before they arrived, Qrow mentioned that his friends had two daughters, aged 15 and 17, names Ruby and Yang. They were both going to attend beacon soon, and excellent future huntresses. Amber looked forward to meeting the two young women.

They arrived at the house, and Qrow opened the door.
15522222.title: Switch to Amber's POV when she wakes up

Amber tells him to go and leave her alone
155222221.content:
"Hey, you must be Amber! Good to meet you. I'm Taiyang, but just call me Tai." A tall blonde guy greeted her at the door. He looked to be in his forties, and although he wasn't particularly unattractive, Amber didn't like how forward he was. Nevertheless, the tried to be polite.

"Hello. I'm Amber. I don't know what Qrows told you about me..." Her sentence trailed off, as she looked at Qrow. Tai did the same, Amber noted that he didn't seem to like Qrow, glaring at him, although he didn't say anything. The maiden wondered why Qrow had taken her to stay with a man who didn't like him, but assumed he had his reasons. It was a good hiding spot at least.

"Me and Tai were on a team together at beacon. We've known each other for years." Qrow explained.

"Please, sit down." Tai said, as though Qrow hadn't even spoken. "Can i get you a drink, anything to eat?" He asked her. Amber was about to politely refuse, but she realised she was in fact starving.

"Erm... sure. Just water please. And a sandwich." She smiled at Taiyang.

"Sure, what kind? Ham? Chicken?"

"Just cheese salad is fine, thank you. I don't eat meat." Amber explained. Tai went into the kitchen to make it. Amber sat on a sofa in the middle of the room facing the TV. Qrow apparently decided not to sit, instead deciding to lean against the wall by the window. The two remained silent until Taiyang returned with Amber's drink and Sandwich. She thanked him, before quickly taking a bite. Before long she had cleaned the plate, unaware of how hungry she really was.

"You sure put that away fast. Guess hospital food ain't so good, huh?" Tai commented as she nodded, taking a drink of water.

"Well, she is eating for two." Qrow retorted. At this Amber gasped, suddenly reminded that she was with child. She dripped her half empty glass, which smashed on the wooden floor.

"I'm so sorry, It was an accident!" She explained, standing up.

"It's OK. It's fine. It's just water." Tai explained. He grabbed a dustpan and brush, and swept up the mess.

"Sorry." Qrow said, awkwardly avoiding eye contact. Suddenly, a blonde teenage girl hurried downstairs.

"I heard glass. Is everything alright?" She asked. She wore jeans and an orange tank top, which left little of her ample chest and perfect figure to the imagination. Amber had to admit that she was a bit jealous of this girls looks.

"We're fine, Yang. Where's your sister?" Tai said to the young woman. Amber recalled that Yang was the older sibling of the two daughters.

"Ruby's out with zwei. Probably be back soon." She said. She turned to Amber. "Hey. I don't know you, do I?"

"No. I'm Amber." She introduced herself.

"Hey I'm Yang." The blonde said, almost flirtingly, though she had only meant to be friendly. Just then a shorter girl with a red cape burst into the room, exclaiming that she was home, as an adorable Welsh corgi rushed in, muddying the carpet.

"RUBY!" Tai explained. "I just cleaned!"

"Oops. Sorry dad!" She said, turning to look at Amber. "Hi! I'm Ruby, yangs sister." She stated, holding her hand out. Amber shook it, startled by this girls upbeat attitude.

"Amber." She replied. Qrow and Tai explained that she would be staying there while the two girls were at beacon and the two men were on missions. They didn't mention about the maidens, although they told the girls that she was pregnant, and that's why she needed to stay somewhere.

"You'll probably need some new clothes." Yang pointed out, referencing Amber's tattered clothes. "Don't worry, I've got loads of stuff you can borrow that I'm not taking to beacon with me."

"Ooh! You can borrow some of my stuff too!" Ruby exclaimed.

"Girls, I'm sure Amber would rather buy her own clothes." Taiyang stated.

"I appreciate the offer though." Amber thanked the girls. The five of them talked for a while, before the girls headed to bed, as they were going to beacon tomorrow. Taiyang explained that he was on a mission too, and would be leaving for at least a few weeks tomorrow. However, he was generous enough to leave Amber one of his credit cards so that she could buy food, clothes and whatever else she needed, before he too went to bed.

"Just me and you now." Qrow stated. There was an awkward silence. Finally Qrow spoke again.

"You know, I'm going on a mission too. Gonna head off in an hour or so." He paced around the room, while Amber sat on the sofa.

"Best of luck." Amber wished him.

"If you want I could stay."

Amber froze. She had her suspicions, but now she knew this guy - this man who was probably nearly thirty years older than her - was coming onto her.

How does she respond?

15522222121.content:
Amber woke up from the best nights sleep she'd had in a long time. She stretched her arms, and pulled back the covers, stepping out of bed. She walked, barefoot to the window and drew the curtains. It looked to be already midmorning, probably about nine o'clock. She washed herself and got dressed, before heading downstairs.

"Morning. You sleep well?" Taiyang asked her.

"Yes. Thank you." She replied. She sat at the table, and Taiyang sat in front of her.

"The girls have headed to catch the airship to beacon. It's their first day." Taiyang explained.

155332212211111.title: Okay.. one more question, who will babysit them?

1553322122111111.content:
Today was the first day of Beacon's vacation month. Room by room, students filed out to spend what would seem like an eternity away from school. Weiss, Yang, Blake, Pyrrha, Ruby, and Nora all had planned on an exclusive girl only vacation at one of Weiss' family beach homes. Except for Blake and Pyrrha, these girls were cheering on their way out. It was as if they'd never been outside the academy.

As for Blake and Pyrrha, both were going along mostly out of peer pressure. Neither wanted to be a stick in the mud and decline. Still, they couldn't hide their true feelings. On the outside, all the other girls could tell that Blake would miss Sun and Pyrrha would miss Juane. Unfortunately for Blake and Pyrrha, their exit out of the academy to the beach home went by without a hitch. In less than an hour, they were already on a private blimp to the beach home.

On the ride there, the rest of the girls talked about what they planned to do. At a couple points, Weiss was tempted to tell Blake and Pyrrha to cheer up. However, at each of these moments, Yang cautioned her against it. According to Yang, they'd cheer up pretty soon. So, Weiss just tucked in her frustration with a pout, thinking to herself "they better." Even if she really wanted to say something, she knew it was to early to complain. Blake would certainly get defensive and, without a day passing, the other girls would surely take Blake and Pyrrha's side.

The ride there took a little longer than the girls would've liked. In about 3 hours they arrived, but they all thought it'd only be an hour and 30 minute flight. Poor weather delayed them for an insufferable amount of time. All the built up excitement, made them practically sick with suspense.

Once they arrived though, the weather had passed, leaving a bright beautiful sun to greet them. All of the girls, even Blake and Pyrrha, were amazed at the scale of this house. It was humongous! It had individual rooms for all of them, several TVs, a pool, a hot tub, a fabulous spot by the ocean, and breathtaking views. Of course, just the front view of the house was enough to make them all go crazy.

Upon seeing their reactions, Weiss gave a smug smile. "See, I told you it would be awesome."

Pyrrha was the first to respond. "I can't believe their leaving us alone without supervision! I hope we all can live up to the responsibility." Pyrrha merely looked at Ruby and Nora after making that statement. Fortunately for her, neither of them noticed.

The rest of the girls followed up with statements like "Thank you so much!" and "You're amazing" to Weiss.

After their shock and gratitude ended, the girls rushed to certain rooms claiming them for their own. Surprisingly, there were no fights over who got what room. Usually, Blake and Weiss would argue, but Blake really didn't feel it'd be polite to complain. Blake, like all the other guests, figured Weiss pulled a lot of strings to make this happen.

About a half hour into their unpacking, something odd happened. The door bell rang. When Weiss came to open the door, nobody was in sight. However, there was a ginormous boxed present on the stoop with a letter attached. All the guests figured this was another surprise by Weiss and started praising Weiss another dozen times. Of course, Weiss was surprised by the package. However, she had no problems being praised for it. Weiss just took the praise without letting anyone know she was equally surprised.

Ruby, Nora, and Yang desperately wanted to open the package, but the other three girls insisted they read the letter first. Strangely, there was no address on the letter. The card inside was quite simple. It had a nicely decorated heart on the front and inside merely read...

"Happy vacation month girls! Here are gifts in honor of this glorious month. I wasn't able to get gifts for everybody though. I got gifts only for the older girls. For now, I apologize Ruby and Nora. I'll make it up later this break!"

Except for Ruby and Nora, all the girls were ecstatic. Out of Ruby and Nora, Nora was especially annoyed and quickly asked. "Hey.. what kind of joke is this? I'm the same age as all of you. How come I didn't get anything?"

Weiss responded rather carelessly to this question. "I don't know. Maybe because you act younger than us."

Nora's annoyance turned to sorrow after that line. "I-I-I really act younger than you all?"

Weiss followed up with another mean comment "Maybe not as young as Ruby, but more or less, yes."

Ruby quickly raised her voice "Hey! That's not nice."

Nora just turned to her teammate, to see if it was true. "D-do you agree Pyrrha?"

Pyrrha was nervous with her answer. "Well.. not all the time. I mean... sometimes you act more mature. It doesn't matter though Pyrrha. We all like you for who you are."

Nora was frustrated and depressed from her teammates answer. "Cya later then.. I'll let the big girls have their big girl time..." Nora quickly went out to the beach to blow off some steam.

Ruby followed suit. "That was pretty mean guys. I'll cya later. Have fun with you gifts."

After Ruby left there was a void of silence followed by Blake and Weiss' first vacation argument. "Ya know, you didn't have to be so mean to her. That was uncalled for."

"Oh please, you all were thinking it. What's wrong with a little honesty."

"You're definition of "a little honesty" is off."

"Well, at least I didn't give that sorry excuse that Pyrrha gave."

Pyrrha then shot up and defended herself. "At least, I tried to be gentle."

"Yeah, and you failed hard at it. Whatever, I'm going to open this box and we can talk it over later. Besides, Ruby is with her. I'm sure she'll be fine."

There was a collective sigh from Yang, Blake, and Pyrrha in response to that. Their hands were pretty tied. They wanted to see what was in the box too. Not to mention, going to apologize for Weiss' statement didn't feel entirely productive.

So, they pitched in and helped unwrap the present. What they found were four individual boxes inside, some bigger than others. Each was labeled for one of the four girls. Within seconds they each had their own present and, on the count of 3, opened their gifts.

Weiss got a new dress, much like her current one, but this one was far more elaborate with snow designs spread throughout. It also felt more comfortable, as though it was made out of cotton. This type of fabric was one that Weiss used to wear all the time when she was little.

Yang got her old teddy bear all sewed up, looking newer than ever. "MR. SNOOKUMS!"

All the other girls looked at her funny. "It's not what you think. This used to be my favorite teddy bear and Ruby ruined it when she was really young. I thought it was thrown out, but apparently not!"

The remaining three girls "aww"ed in response to her story.

Blake got a book titled "Peace between Humans and Faunus: Years of Long Forgotten History." Immediately after reading the title, Blake hugged the book tight. This is something she'd always wanted to read about, since she was young. However, very few books covered the topic. The book was a purple hard cover wand smooth to the touch. It was the perfect gift for Blake.

Lastly, Pyrrha got a golden crescent style bracelet, which reminded her of the symbol on Juane's shield. It was also a bracelet, one of her favorite fashion accessories since she was little. However, as she grew up to become a huntress, it had become too risky to wear bracelets. In time, she just forgot about the accessory to focus on her training. Seeing another bracelet though, especially one so pretty, brought back so many wonderful memories. She was in complete love with this bracelet!

Almost seconds after finding out their presents, they were distracted by them. Slowly but surely each of these gifts would regress them into babies. However, they would be too distracted to notice.

Who's age regression shall we follow first?
1553322122111111.title: An Unusal Start to a Long Break.

15533221221111112.content:
Yang rushed into the room where she unpacked her belongings. Immediately, she started jumping onto the bed with her teddy bear in her arms. Little did she know that the teddy bear was siphoning age from her as she held it. The more surface it touched, the faster it would suck the age out of her. The teddy bear had a limit though. Once the bearer reached a year old, it's age sucking function would cease.

The age regression that was beginning to take shape was unusual though. It wouldn't erase the regressed's memory, but it would give the victim the mental and physical trappings of a 1 year old. Lastly, it wouldn't get rid of the victim's ability to speak, but it would heavily hinder it.

All these nuanced details were hidden behind Yang's love for her precious teddy bear. Yang just kept bouncing on her bed, gigging with glee at her reunion with Mr. Snookums. After about a 5 minutes of needless bed jumping, something went wrong. Yang dropped her Mr. Snookums onto the floor. In reality, there wasn't any reason to be concerned. However, at this point, Yang was only 10. (Meaning she lost 7 years.) As a result, the fear that she would lose her teddy bear again loomed heavily over her. With each minute she had spent with Mr. Snookums, she he remembered how heartbreaking it was to lose him.

Almost immediately after dropping Mr. Snookums, tears formed around the corner of her eyes. She raced to the floor, holding Mr. Snookums tightly in her ever shrinking arms. In a high pitched voice, she screeched "PLEASE DON'T LEAVE ME MR. SNOOKUMS!"

The emotional trauma of dropping her teddy bear distracted her from the increasing bagginess of her clothing. In fact, within only a minute of squeezing Mr. Snookums in her arms, she reached the tender age of 5. Her clothes, which were already short at the age of 17, merely slipped through her. This left her as nothing more than a naked 5 year old squeezing a teddy bear on top of a pile of clothes. And after another minute of senseless squeezing, Yang's age regression stopped.

Now, she was just a 1 year old, a wailing one at that. Her fears of losing Mr. Snookums never went away after she started hugging him. In fact, hugging him only made her fears larger. Her fears became so big, that even while hugging Mr. Snookums, she was terrified. So, like any terrified baby, she had started wailing.

Not long after, the naked Yang peed on her previous clothes out of increased fear. Soon enough, more fears were toppled on, such as a fear of freezing to death, a fear of malnutrition, and a fear of being unloved. All of these added on fears were a result of being naked with no one to care for her. For that reason, common fears of baby-hood crept onto her.

The once powerful student was now as weak as can be.

Who shall we follow now?
15533221221111112.title: Older Sister? More like Baby Sister...

155332212211111121.content:
Weiss hurried to one of the bathrooms with her brand new dress. She didn't want to lose a second of trying it on. Right after entering her individual bathroom, she locked the door and stripped naked. Common sense seemed to be the last thing on her mind. After all, she should’ve kept her panties on, but for some reason thought the dress would “feel grander” if she didn’t.

Her loss of what some people would call “sanity” had to do with the fabric of the dress. It carried sentimental memories of her being wrapped up in it as a baby. She loved the fabric so much that she had demanded as a child that her other dresses be made of the same fabric. It wasn’t until she approached her teen years that the fabric stopped being used for her clothing. The fashion industry was moving into other fabrics and poor Weiss couldn’t change that.

However, now was different. Somehow, someway, the same design she loved so much was made with this beloved fabric. What she didn’t know was that for every second she wore that dress, a month of age would vanish from her. The age regression effects also mimicked that of Yang’s teddy. She’d be able to speak, but poorly at that. She’d have her memories, but she’d have physical and mental characteristics of a 1 year old. Since she was only 17 when she first put on this particular dress, within a mere 3 minutes and 12 seconds she’d be a 1 year old.

As Weiss regressed, she noticed the dress becoming bigger on her. That said, she didn’t actually connect what was happening. Rather she just tried to bury herself more into the fabric when she noticed it was bigger. By the time she was 13, she started panicking. She was just then beginning to fear losing this fabric as Yang feared losing her teddy. In essence, that first minute of senseless joy was over. Tears came into fill the gap.

Weiss started to believe that it wouldn’t be long until she outgrew this dress (Even though the dress was literally too big for her at this point.) Her tears eventually mounted into a perpetually worse problem.

Weiss began to notice the dress was getting wet and, thus, uncomfortable. As a result, Weiss began to cry even more. She couldn’t stop telling herself that she “ruined” the lovely dress.

At the age of 4, the weight of the now wet dress was too heavy, causing little Weiss to fall flat on her butt. At this point, only one side of the dress could hang from her shoulder, while the rest of the dress sagged to the floor.

The coldness of the bathroom floor felt terrible! Even worse, Weiss’s tears had made the floor wet and slippery. She tried to get her bearings, which quickly meant getting on all fours in the crawling position. But by the age of 2, even that position was quite hard to maintain, as the floor was too slippery. So, Weiss finally fell belly first onto her wet new dress.

For the next 12 seconds, she just laded there, wailing her eyes out. It wasn’t long after before the little one had to go poppy. As an infant, she could only do one thing. She let her instincts take over, causing her to make a nice big brown stain on the middle portion of the dress. For the remainder of her one-on-one with the dress, she just mentally criticized herself for being so messy.

The once dignified student was as messy as can be.

Who shall we follow now?
155332212211111121.title: Ice Queen? More like Wittle Snowflake...

choices: Something else, I don't know, just something else.
1553322122111111211.content:
Right after Blake found out what her gift was, she wanted to find the most soothing place to read it. That wound up being the chairs out by the pool. As soon as she got outside, she realized it was too hot though. So, she booked it to her room and put on a two piece bathing suit. Normally, Blake wouldn’t wear something so “show-y.” This was no normal occasion. She wanted to read this book in the best circumstances imaginable, regardless of what others might think.

In a flash, she had put on her lavender two piece bathing suit. She then raced outside with her new book, set up a towel over a plastic relaxing chair. Then she dived into the book. She wanted to read through the contents as fast as possible. However, this only played into the age regression function of the book. For each book syllable she read to herself or out-loud, she would lose 1 week. The age regression effects operated the same for her as they did for Yang and Weiss. At the age of 1, she’d have mental and physical baby habits. She’d be able to talk, but to limited effect. This further meant that her ability to read would be hindered.

None of these factors were even remotely noticeable to her though. The age regression effects didn’t impact her reading until she hit the twelfth page. By this point, she was only 5 years old and her bathing suit was already loose and beneath her. As for her bow, it was taking much of her head now, much larger in proportion now.

Amazingly, she had spent much of the age regression completely immersed in this book. That all changed though at the age of 5. At this point, she had trouble pronouncing some of the words. Some words she couldn’t even understand anymore. Blake’s reaction to this was unusual. Upon having difficulty reading, Blake merely lectured herself.

She internally prodded herself on her inability to read much farther. This aspect then distracted her from the message in the sentences. In gist, she was focusing more on simply reading the text, instead of understanding it.

This continued for about a minute, by which point she was already at age 1. At this age, she couldn’t even concentrate on the book anymore. Instead, her five senses dominated her focus. The burning sensation of the sun scared her. It was as if she forgot what it felt like to be outside. The soft crashes of the waves off to the distance frightened her. It was as if she felt a monster was trying to get her. Everything seemed so big to her. From her perspective, she was high above the ground and the slightest sight of the ground caused her to panic. The weight of the bow was even too much for her to take.

So, in a feat of cute baby bravery, she tried pulling it out. After a couple tugs, it managed to come undone, leaving her cat ears exposed. Unlike at age 17 though, at age 1, her cat ears took up a large part of her head.

By now, she couldn’t help but talk to herself out loud.

“Wisen-wup Bwake.. be bwave… me no afwad ob monsta!”

Just then another wave crashed and Blake completely lost what little composure she had. She quickly burst into tears, wailing at the top of her lungs.

She still desperately wanted to read that book, but everything was so scary. She couldn’t help herself. She just wailed, hoping someone strong would save her from the frightening monster.

The once composed student was as scared as can be.
1553322122111111211.title: Blakie Wakie, You're Too Young to Read Silly...

15533221221111112111.content:
All the other girls were out of the main living room so fast that Pyrrha felt it best to stay there. She quickly put the golden bracelet on her wrist. Instead of being obsessed with the object though, like her friends, she was obsessed with what the object represented. It represented bracelets, a fashion accessory she could no longer enjoy. It represented a time in her life where creativity had a bigger emphasis. It represented something she long missed.

Interestingly, the age regression effects for this gift correlated with the thoughts it conjured. More specifically, for each memory brought on by the bracelet, Pyrrha would regress to whatever year she was at in that memory. For instance, if she remembered a bracelet at X age, she would regress to said age. Like her friends, by the time she hit age 1, she’d have baby mental and physical tendencies and her speech would be significantly altered.

The first memory she could think of was her last bracelet. It was a silver bracelet and had acquired an element of luck. Whenever Pyrrha had worn that bracelet, she felt like the odds came into her favor. That said, there’s a special reason this bracelet was her last. It was her only bracelet to break in sparring. She was 13 when it had happened. As always, her instructors recommended her to remove it and she ignored them. Pyrrha couldn’t remember how exactly the bracelet broke as the memory was tucked into her subconscious. Still, she could remember what happened and, more importantly, how she felt when it happened. When it had happened, she was emotionally devastated.

As Pyrrha started picturing the memory, tears flowed from her cheeks. Within that instant, she regressed to the age of 13 and her clothes became noticeably baggy to a bystander. Her head brace was now around her neck. She was too mentally distraught though to realize any of this. Her tears carried on for about a solid 5 minutes, until she slowly regained her composure.

After getting out of this stupor, she noticed her new bracelet again and a happier memory came to her. She thought of the point in her life when she was obsessed with gold bracelets. She had nearly 12 bracelets that year, all a different design, but nonetheless gold. This was roughly around the age of 5. As a result, her body quickly shrunk to that of her 5 year old self. Her hair was notably shorter, not going down nearly as much. Most of her clothes were now on the floor leaving a mostly naked 5 year old. The only piece that remained was her head brace. It was now around her waist. The golden bracelet that spawned that memory was on the couch near her. Pyrrha was happy though throughout this, only thinking of her many gold bracelets.

With one last glance at the new bracelet, she remembered the first bracelet she ever got at the age of 1. It was a bean bracelet with a crescent design on it. She could remember very little about that time in her life, but the bracelet’s crescent was imprinted into her memory. It was this unique bracelet that made her fall in love with bracelets in the first place. It was shiny, so pwetty…

As you one might expect, by this point Pyrrha had regressed all the way back to the adorable age of 1. And, of course, she was completely and utterly naked. Nothing more. At this point, she didn’t have nearly that much hair left, but she didn’t seem to mind. In fact, unlike her friends, she seemed… happy. She crawled out of her head brace and looked around the room.

“Oooo.. soo pwetty” she said out loud.

After that she just looked down at her chubby hands with curiosity. “Me so tiny, me..” And then it hit her... “me a baby.”

Even after coming to this realization, she remained happy. Very quickly after coming to this realization, a baby instinct kicked in; she started sucking on her thumb.

Of course, Pyrrha hadn’t registered all the implications of being a baby. In complete truth, she had only registered one implication… “Me no ma wa-spon-sa-bol!” (“Me no more responsible!” is what she said)

The once capable student was now rather helpless.

Now, let's follow Ruby and Nora on their way home. They have a biiig surprise awaiting them.
15533221221111112111.title: Once a Fearsome Warrior.. Now a Bubbly Baby...

155332212211111121111.content:
By the time all their friends regressed to babies, Ruby and Nora were on their way home. They had traveled quite a distance from the house. So, it’d be a little bit until they heard Blake’s wails outside. On their walk, Nora unsurprisingly did most of the talking.

“I still can’t believe they said what they said…”

“Nora, I’m sure they didn’t mean it. Weiss probably was embarrassed she didn’t know your age and wanted to cover her tracks. I bet Pyrrha just didn’t want to start an argument.”

“Still though, I mean how could she think I was younger?”

“Well… it’s not the nicest thing to think, but people tend to believe younger people have more spirit. Honestly, I’ve come to take it as a compliment. Ya know? I mean, I like being spirited. It beats being a buzzkill.”

“Hmm… you really think it’s that simple? If it is, then I’m ecstatic! I’d love to be known as the most spirited!!”

“Haha, me too!”

“Ooh… that makes me wonder. What gifts did the others get that would imply their older? Maybe dictionaries and monotone lectures. Those things are so boring!”

“Haha, that’d be funn-“ Ruby cut herself off upon hearing a faint wail. “Do you hear that?”

“Hear what?”

“The wail, it’s pretty faint, but it sounds like it’s coming from the beach home.”

“There’s a WHALE AT THE BEACH HOME?!”

“No… not that kind of wail. I was referring to like a scream, like someone’s screaming.”

“Ooooo… then in that case, yes I can hear that.”

“It doesn’t sound good. I think we should hurry to the house. I feel like something’s wrong.”

“You sure? I just thought they were watching a scary movie or something.”

Ruby just ignored Nora’s theory and started running, keeping her ear out for the sound. The sound kept getting progressively louder. The sound of “waaa!” turned to “Waaaaaah!” and then eventually into “WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!” By that point, the two of them were merely steps away from seeing the house. Ruby started to panic. “That sounds like a baby!”

“Oh don’t be silly Ruby, I’m sure a baby wasn’t sent in the mail.”

“That’s not what I meant, I meant it in that-“ Ruby paused with fear upon finding the source of the noise. It was what she feared.

Nora just turned to Ruby in childlike curiosity “meant by what Ruby?”

Ruby said softly “turn to where I’m facing. That’s what I meant.”

Nora did as instructed and was amazed at what she saw. “WOW! It really was a baby!”

Nora was filled with glee. She loved babies. They were so cute and adorable. So, like all the other times she spotted a baby, she went up to it, hoping to cuddle it.

Nora picked the naked baby up, rocking it back and forth. “Hi there little one, what’s your name? I’m Nora, a qualified babysitter professional!”

Nora’s rocking greatly soothed Blake, causing her to slowly calm down and wipe her tears off. “Wha-wha aw ya tawkin’ abowt Na-wa? Ya kno me.. Me Bway-ka”

“Interesting. I have a friend named Blake too, but she’s much older.”

Blake started to get upset. “Stop tweetin me wike ah bay-be. Me is dat freen-da.”

There was a pause of silence, followed by Nora’s sudden realization “You mean... You’re Blake!”

Ruby came up behind them. “That’s what I was trying to tell you Nora. I think our friends were turned into babies.”

Ruby then picked up Blake, who was suddenly shocked at hearing she was a baby. “Way a min-net… da wud es-pwane why you too aw a-bol ta hole me, but den dat meens…” Blake suddenly burst into tears. “ME A BAY-BE! WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!”

Ruby quickly rocked her back and forth, humming to sooth her. This surprisingly worked wonders. Once Blake wiped away her tears again, Ruby calmed her by saying “It’s okay Blake. We can fix this.”

To that, Nora responded “Awww.. do we have to? She looks sooo cute! I can’t wait to see what the other-“

Blake cut her off. “Me nah cute! You no bay-be me. Me oda wike you!”

Nora joked around after that line, booping Blake’s nose “Eeeeexcept, you’re not anymore!”

Before Blake burst out into fury, Ruby cut in. “Nora, please stop. It’s not helping. Now, Blake, please tell us what happened.”

Nora shrugged to that response, making funny faces to Blake in the midst of their conversation.

Blake finally had a moment to speak though. “Wew, me an da odas got diffa-wen gifs. Wees ga a dwess, Yan ga ah teddy name Mista Snuk-ums, Pie-wa ga bwace-wet, an Me gots book.” Blake then pointed to the book on the chair. “So, me ga dwessed fa owt-side an den me wed book, but on da twa-twa-twa (she had trouble saying twelfth) on da page too afta ten me ha twob-bol weedin’ an den me ear monsta! Me got sca-wed an staw-ted cwy-win. Den ya too a-wibed.”

Nora responded first to Blake’s story. “Monster? What monster?” A couple seconds after Nora asked, another set of waves crashed.

Immediately after hearing the sound, Blake said “DAT!” and buried her face in Ruby’s chest, hugging for her dear life.
Ruby smiled “There there Blakie, that’s just the waves. There’s no monster.”

Blake looked up at her friend with a tear-y eyed face “Y-y-ya sure?”

“Yes, I’m sure. But let’s get you inside anyways.”

Blake nodded “Me agwee…”

So, Ruby with a naked babified Blake in her arms opened the pool door to the inside. Nora followed behind. “Nora, I have a feeling, all of them were turned into babies. Please go upstairs and find one. We need to get them all re-situated. I call my sister.”

Who should we follow?
155332212211111121111.title: One walk! After One Walk Everything Goes Haywire!

choices: No, Let's Continue to Follow Ruby!
1553322122111111211111.content:
Ruby carefully walked to the middle level, trying to be mindful of Blake’s feelings. That said, it was a little hard to do so with Nora’s shouting. Ruby couldn’t make out what Nora was saying, but it better have been worth it. Once Ruby got to the middle level though, she couldn’t see Nora, but she could hear two sets of wails. One was fainter coming from Weiss’ room and the other was more pronounced coming from her sister’s room.

Ruby couldn’t help but hurry to her sister. It was a very instinctual move, but she wasn’t thinking clearly. By rushing more and moving to the louder sound, Blake started to get scared, clutching onto Ruby’s dress. Right as they were approaching the room, Blake had lost it. She started bursting into wails as well.

“WAAAAAAAAAAAH”

Ruby momentarily ignored Blake’s wails to see her sister. Just moments after Blake started wailing, Ruby spotted Yang. Yang was still hugging Mr. Snookums as a naked baby. Not to mention, the room smelled terrible. The scent of Yang’s pee soaked clothes filled the room.

Ruby’s nose was not enjoying it. “Oh my.. that smells really bad.”

Meanwhile, Blake continued to scream. “WAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!”

Rest assured, Yang couldn’t help but look up to see where the noise was coming from. Immediately upon seeing someone, she screamed “NOO!! PWEASE NO TAKE MISTA SNUK-UMS! WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!”

Ruby was losing her patience, but she tried to contain herself. So, she simply took some deep breathes and started singing a song to sooth the babies. “Rock a bye babies in the tree top, If they holler the cradles will drop. Rock a bye babies in the tree top, if they holler the cradles will drop.”

It took a while, but after several more lines of that song the two babies, Blake and Yang, were drowsy, on the verge of going to sleep.

So, Ruby carefully but quickly kneeled down to Yang’s level. She gently placed Blake near Yang, butt first on the soft carpet. Normally, putting a naked baby on a carpet was a terrible idea. Then again, this was one of those special circumstances where it didn’t matter as much.

Ruby softly spoke after lowering Blake. “It’s okay. I’m here. Are you two alright?”

Blake and Yang drowsily looked to where the sound was coming from and nodded.

Ruby gave a smile and motherly said. “Good. I don’t want my two amazing babies to be sad.”

Upon saying that, Yang looked around in disbelief “Way.. wha? M-m-me ah bAY-“ Ruby cut her off with a finger, already knowing what Yang was about to do.

“Shhhh.. it’s okay. We’ll take care of this. You all won’t stay young for long.”

Yang adorably tilted her head in curiosity. “You wiw?”

Blake responded to that one, crossing her arms in cute frustration. “Yep. A-par-wen-wy, me, yo-wa, Wees, an Pie-wa tur inta bay-bes. Da gifs wa ah twick.”

Yang defensively hugged her little teddy bear after hearing that. “Nu uhh… Mista Snuk-ums i-ent mean. He fwen-wy. He neva wud do dat to me.”

Blake became even more frustrated. “Den es-pwane why Wuby is so bii an we sma-ol, an an dat we nay-ked.”

Yang couldn’t retaliate against that, but the thought of Mr. Snookums being the cause of something so terrible just saddened her so. She slowly said “Den… he-he-“ Ruby cut her off again.

“It’s okay Sis. I’m sure it wasn’t Mr. Snookums doing. He’s your friend after all. Let me just check something though.”

Yang defensively said “NO! You bwake Mista Snuk-ums be-fa. Me no twus you!”

Ruby paused for a moment, before facepalming. “Oh yea… Then.. you got me. I understand why you don’t trust me. Can you tell me though how your reunion with him has been?”

“Um.. me gess…”

While Yang was going on her long-winded story, Ruby used an eye device to see if any more dust remained on the teddy bear. Fortunately, it registered as magic safe. Ruby thought to herself “It seems the effects have worn off. Best to check the other items, but for now, we should be safe.”

Ruby just nodded her head throughout Yang’s story “Uh huh, ahhh, that sounds cool.”

Luckily for Ruby, Yang took the bait. Blake on the other hand, knew Ruby didn’t really listen and just sighed. She said to herself “Ah.. ya haf ta be kiddin me..”

Yang tilted her head “Wha? Wha da matta?”

“Wha da matta? WHA DA MATTA? We aw bay-bes! Dat wha da matta! Me am fwi-ten-da, bu yo-wa seem ta be fine. Ya eben dun we-wise ya pee-da on ya cwos! Why dat?!”

Ruby tried to cut off Blake, but nothing seemed to work. She got her ears ready for the two to fight and eventually cry. However, nothing of the sort happened.

Yang simply said back “Yea? So? Me ge ta be wit Mista Snuk-ums, so me hap-pee.”

Blake was shocked “Wah! Wa abowt di-pas an bed times an an an bay-be foo. Da dent dat upset you?”

“Nah wiw-wy. Dis me bwake. Dis aw-so meens no wushin ta da bat-woom, no ak-si-en-tol aaw nigh tas, an no ma che-win. Dat seem wike fun ta me. An tink abowt it. Fa yo-wa, ya hab bee time stor-wies, an stwowa wides, an an Wuby hugs.”

Blake paused for a second. “Me gess.. Me jus na use ta it. Me tink sometin ba is gonna hap-pen.”

“Wike wha?”

“Wike… wha ib me fa ob bed?”

“Dat why bay-bes hab cwibs.”

“Bu ho-wa aw we gonna ge cwibs an wha wiw odas tink ib dey see us?”

“Bwake, dat fa da gwow-nups to de-cide.”

“Bu me am gwow-nup!”

“No. You bay-be. Wike me.. An, an… me happy yo-wa bay-be wike me” Little Yang got a little tear-y eyed and hugged Blake after saying that.

Blake was caught off guard by Yang’s warm hug. Being a naked baby was a rather cold experience. Blake’s reaction to the hug was quite positive though and she too got a little tear-y eyed. “Tanks.. sowwy me be-in gwump-y. Me jus jus scar-wad. Bu me twy ta be hap-pee. Me gess, cus me not awone. Tanks fa show-wen me dat.”

“No pwob-wum. Dat wha fwens aw for.”

After Yang said that, Ruby couldn’t contain the “daaaaws” and hugged them both. “Awwww, that’s exactly the kind of attitude I like hearing! Let’s go onward to Weiss! Isn’t this so exiting?!”

Blake spoke up after that. “Ya kina woo-ened da mo-men.”

Yang rebutted. “Me wike it. Dats me bay-be sista!”

On that note, Ruby lifted the two babies up, one in both of her arms. Blake to her left and Yang to her right. Ruby couldn’t contain her giggles though from Yang’s statement. “Technically, you’re my baby sister now Yang. Not like I was. It’s no longer a saying. It’s more literal.”

Yang blushed “Ya ga me. Fa now, me caw yo-wa mommy sis.”

Ruby laughed “Haha, I humbly accept.”

That exchange just made Blake say in a deadpanned voice “Me neba gonna unda-stan sista bons…”

The two of them all laughed as Ruby slowly walked out of the room.

Who shall we follow now?
1553322122111111211111.title: An Odd Meetup, In Just an Hour They're Both Babies

choices: Ruby and Nora Both Meet Up Before Seeing Weiss!
15533221221111112111111.content:
After Ruby told Nora to go to another baby, Nora rushed to the main level. She started calling out enthusiastically “Is anybody home?!” This loud question blocked out the noise coming from Weiss’ room. As for a response, well, maybe there was or maybe there wasn’t. Nora couldn’t tell because she was too busy talking.

Nora enthusiastically shouted to Ruby’s annoyance. “A little baby told me that you all turned into babies! Where are my babies at? Ahh, come on! Don’t be shy! I guess if no one will speak up, I’ll go to the living room! If you all are hiding, I’ll find ya!”

Nora rushed up one more set of stairs to the top level and plopped herself on the couch unaware that Pyrrha was just nearby.

“Hmm… now if I was a baby trying to hide from me, where would I go?”

Pyrrha then spoke up, getting Nora out of her self-dialogue. “Nora? Wha aw ya do-win?”

“Well I’m just looking for-“ Nora cut herself off after seeing Pyrrha.

“There you are! You silly goose, why were you hiding from me?”

Pyrrha just sighed “Me ac-twy wa-went. Me wa yew-win ah hawd ah me can, bu ya showts wa too woud.”

Nora blushed “Haha.. sorry… about that. So.. anyways, how is the second baby-hood going?” Nora then lifted her babified teammate into her arms, cradling her back in forth.

Pyrrha nervously looked up to Nora to say “Wew.. dis may soun odd comin fwom me, bu me weawy wike it!”

Nora was happily astonished “Really?! That’s awesome! Because once I heard that you were a baby, I was soooo excited. I have so many ideas for what we can do. Like, we could-“

Pyrrha cut her off “Way, how di ya kno befa ya saw me?”

“Well, me and Ruby found Blakie as a baby near the pool. Ruby guessed you all turned into babies as well due to the gifts. I wanted it to be true, so I just acted on it, and what do you know, she was right!”

“Wow.. dats a-wat ta tay-ka in.”

“Why? What’s the matter?”

“Me no kno. Me jus figur dat me da onwy wun. Me sorta wor-weed dat da wes aw bay-bes too.”

“Why? I thought you just said you really like being a baby.”

“Me do. Bu dat da ting. Me tink da odas, e-spe-awy Wees, be angwy wit it. Den yo-wol wiw wan ta chay us bak. Bu bu…” Pyrrha started to tear up “me no wanna go bak! Me wanna be bay-be fa-eba!!!! WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!”

Nora reacted rather professionally and motherly to Pyrrha’s concerns. She rocked Pyrrha back and forth and said calmly “It’s okay baby… As you’re team mate, I won’t make them do anything to you that you don’t want. Think of me as your mommy.”

Pyrrha quickly calmed down. “We-weawy? Me no hafta tur bak?”

“Of course not. I mean we’re on the same team and I just happen to be a fantastic babysitter. Granted, if I’m gonna be changing your diapers for the next several years, I think ‘mommy’ sounds more accurate.”

Pyrrha grew a giant smile on her face upon hearing that “Yay! Nowa Mommy! Mommy Nowa! Dis is da bes gif eba!”

“Ooooh, I could also bring you into battles on a baby harness and you could learn how to fling arrows. You could be the first ever baby huntress!”

Despite how ridiculous this sounded, Pyrrha was not in the right state of mind and replied “Weawy?! Dat soun fun! Me.. me… happy…. Tank you Nowa” Pyrra then motioned for a hug and Nora fully accepted it.

For about a solid minute, the two of them were embraced in a ginormous hug. They were no longer just friends or teammates. They were also fully invested in a mommy and baby relationship.

Unfortunately, for Nora, something unpleasant happened in this moment. Pyrrha suddenly felt the urge to pee and peed all over Nora’s pink dress skirt! And Pyrrha really had to pee. That said, Pyrrha had no idea what was happening though while she did it. It was as if the lower portion of her body was just acting on its own.

Luckily, Nora didn’t make a commotion. Instead, she just continued to hug Pyrrha throughout the entire accident. It was a little hard to resist doing something about it though. Not to mention, Pyrrha peed for what seemed to be a solid minute. Nonetheless, Nora said nothing. She knew the little one had to pee and it was better on her than the carpet or couch.

After Pyrrha was done, Nora held Pyrrha in her arms, preventing the little one from seeing what she did.

Pyrrha was the first one to speak up after the hug. “Nowa, me can nah way fa ma ob ya wubbin. Afta dat amay-sin hug, me bets yo-wa gib da bes bed time storwies an diapa chan-ges.”

Nora just giggled it off. “Haha, you have no idea Pyrrha. My diaper changes will rock your world! Actually, on that note, would the little one like a diaper change now?”

Pyrrha just paused for a second to adorably think “Mmmm.. yes pwease!”

“Awesome! There’s only one teensy weensy catch.”

Pyrrha adorably tilted her head in curiosity “Wha dat Nowa?”

“We have no diapers or baby powder, so I’d have to be using the red cloth from your previous clothes without any powder. Is that okay sweetie?”

“Me gess. Me nots eba gonna nee dat, so me no mine. Me do wan pow-da eben-tu-awy dou.”

“Awww, that’s my girl! Don’t worry, I’ll be getting you fresh diapers and baby powder later today.”

“Tanks mommy, I meen Nowa”

Nowa said in response “Call me whatever you like sweetie. I don’t mind at all.”

Pyrrha giggled at the thought of continuing to call Nora ‘mommy.’ “Hehe, kay Mommy.”

Then without much of a second later, Nora stood up with Pyrrha in one arm and kneeled down to get the red cloth. She then used the couch as a surface, gently putting Pyrrha on it without letting her see Nora’s wet dress skirt. Nora did this, because she figured the couch was soft and that Pyrrha wouldn’t have to go again for a little bit. Once all the pieces were in position, Nora lifted Pyrrha’s chubby legs high up and slid the red cloth underneath. Luckily for Pyrrha, that cloth was cotton and made a great makeshift diaper. Nora then wrapped the cloth around Pyrrha’s behind and locked it snugly in place with a bobby pin.

Once Nora was finished, Pyrrha giggled “Me wike da di-pa Mommy.”

“Awww, I’m glad you do sweetie. Now, do you want to go to your friends?”

Pyrrha pondered for a second and then responded “Yes.”

So, Nora picked up the little one into her arms and walked down to the main level at a moderate pace.

What shall happen now?
15533221221111112111111.title: Once Friends.. Now They're Mommy and Baby...

choices: Ruby and Nora Receive the Needed Baby Supplies at the Front Door
155332212211111121111111.content:
At the paces they were walking, Nora and Ruby wound up crossing each other’s paths.

Ruby looked at the little one in Nora’s arms and “awed.” “Awwww.. Pyrrha, you look soo adorable! That diaper is very fitting.”

Pyrrha smiled and enthusiastically replied “Tanks! Mommy made it for me!”

Ruby, Yang, and Blake all said with a shocked tone of voice “Mommy?”

Pyrrha giggled and nodded in response “Uh huh. Nowa say me can caw ha dat. Me wanna do dat. It make me fee more wike baby.”

Ruby just gave an awkward “Well, I’m happy you’re happy!”

Pyrrha just smiled to that.

Then Ruby spotted Nora’s wet dress skirt. “So… Nora, did the little one have an accident?”

Nora sighed. “It’s not that bad. It happens.”

Pyrrha then looked worried “Di-di me do sometin wong?”

“No sweetie, you’re just fine the way you are.”

Blake just rolled her eyes to that statement. She accepted what happened, but things just felt way too weird today. No amount of hugs could change that.

Nonetheless, the two babysitters carried their babies to the faint sound of wails until it became enormous.

“WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!”

Ruby said before they opened the bathroom door “Here goes nothing..”

Once they opened the door, the wails became enormous with a wretched smell to boot.

Weiss’ wails caused the other babies to wail as well. Before Ruby and Nora knew it, all the babies were crying.

Like before, Ruby started singing “Rock a bye Baby.” Nora soon got the hint to also sing and the two of them sang calmly to stop all the tears. Eventually, little by little, the little ones calmed down.

Normally, at this point, Ruby would stop, but she continued on. Nora followed along. After a few more sing throughs, all the babies were asleep.

Ruby did this, because she was honestly tired and the last thing she wanted to deal with was a baby Weiss wining.

What now?
155332212211111121111111.title: Wowzers! Things Change! They Need a Breather!

choices: Follow Ruby and Nora back to Weiss' room
1553322122111111211111111.content:
After the babies were asleep, Nora and Ruby put Pyrra, Blake, and Yang on a towel. Nora then whispered “now what do we do?”

Ruby just sighed and walked out of the room, gesturing Nora to do the same. Once the two of them were out, Ruby closed the door quietly and went to different room.

Once inside, Ruby just slumped on a bed. “I don’t know… I’ve never babysat before.”

Nora tried to cheer her up with some optimism “Don’t fear Ruby, we can handle it.”

“How? Once one starts crying, it sets off all of them. Not to mention, Weiss is going to be hard to babysit. I don’t know what she did in that bathroom, but if I had to guess, she pooped…”

Nora paused briefly “Well.. that is pretty gross, but look at my skirt. Babies can be gross. But they’re also cute and cuddly and adorable.”

“But Nora, what do I do? I’m the leader of team RWBY and I let this happen. If I had trouble leading my team before, how can I do it now.”

Before Nora could make a response, the doorbell rang.

Ruby jumped at the sound, hoping it was something good. Sure enough it was another package with no sender. On the package was a little letter that read “Enjoyed the surprise? Here’s the package I promised earlier. For your sanity, I recommend you use this dust immediately. Just throw it on the ground in this house and reality will transform to aid you.”

Ruby asked the obvious “What’s that supposed to mean?”

“No idea, but there’s only one way to find out.”

Nora then threw the dust on the ground and the house was instantly consumed in thick pink smoke. Ruby and Nora were scared, but just waited it out. About a minute later, the smoke cleared and both of them were amazed at what happened. They were older!

From their figures, they guessed both of them were in their early 20s. Not only that, the house changed too. All the walls were painted in a de-saturated pink with little white clouds.

What shall they do now?
1553322122111111211111111.title: Another Odd Package and the Pause After It's Use
